text: Munaphikaharu (kapati)la'i sadhaim yasa kurako bhaya rahancha ki musalamanaharumathi yasto surah avatarita nahos jasale uniharuko hrdayaka kura yiniharula'i bata'ide'os. Bhanidinus timi khilli uda'irakha, nihsandeha mahana allaha tyasala'i prakata garnevala cha, juna kurako timila'i bhaya cha
